EmailTemplate.name: RE: [FWD: RE: Conference call (1343958628.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: [FWD: RE: Conference call (1343958628.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Jim, Nice to meet you via email. You have completed the online enrollment; the last step is sending me a copy of your I-9 form. You did provide this to us perviousloy but unfortuently the form has expeired so we will need an updated one. I have attached an updated I-9 for you, the password to open is the last 4 digits of your SSN. Once the document is is open you will sign/date section 1 and a local notary will sign/date section 2 ( there will be instructions on how to complete this form in your enrollment documents as well.) You can send this back to me via email (I dont need a hard copy.) I will also need you to send me a copy of your US passport (you can just take a picture with your phone and email that to me.) I would also like to walk you through a net cash estimate so you can get a feel for the way the cash flow works with MBO. Please give me a ring when you have about 10 minutes and can be infront of a computer and we will walk through this. Please feel free to reach out to me with any questions. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Jacqueline Crook Sent: Thursday, August 02, 2012 4:41 PM To: paul.shahady@seniorexecutiveservices.com Cc: jakuiken@verdantstrategies.com; Sara Conde Subject: RE: [FWD: RE: Conference call] Hi Paul, It looks like Jim started the enrollment for the EXEC program back in 2009 but never actually finished the onboarding process. I have copied Sara who should be able to help him get onboarded. Thanks! ___________________________________Jacqueline CrookClient Enrollment ManagerMBO Partners t: 703.793.6280f: 703.793.6454e: jcrook@mbopartners.com <jcrook@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: paul.shahady@seniorexecutiveservices.com <mailto:paul.shahady@seniorexecutiveservices.com> [mailto:paul.shahady@seniorexecutiveservices.com] <mailto:[mailto:paul.shahady@seniorexecutiveservices.com]> Sent: Thursday, August 02, 2012 12:00 PM To: Jacqueline Crook Cc: jakuiken@verdantstrategies.com <mailto:jakuiken@verdantstrategies.com> Subject: [FWD: RE: Conference call] Jackie, What's the status of Jim Kuiken with MBO Partners? Is he a 1099 inactive consultant or a W-2 MBO Partners inactive employee? Since he hasn't been active for two years, does he have to start from scratch to get back in the MBO Partners process? Paul -------- Original Message -------- Subject: RE: Conference call From: Jim Kuiken <jakuiken@verdantstrategies.com <mailto:jakuiken@verdantstrategies.com>> Date: Wed, August 01, 2012 2:22 pm To: Jean James <jean.james@seniorexecutiveservices.com <mailto:jean.james@seniorexecutiveservices.com>> Cc: Paul Shahady <paul.shahady@seniorexecutiveservices.com <mailto:paul.shahady@seniorexecutiveservices.com>>Jean, Thanks for responding so quickly. I dont have a specific opportunity, but Ive been out of the loop for a while (about 2 years), and want to get reacquainted with SES Services, updating my profile, how I log in and manage my profile, how to engage if/when I bring an opportunity in, fees, etc., etc. As you can tell, I havent really been paying attention to consulting while I was busy setting up and running for public office. Im back in the saddle now, and need to re-engage, and basically need a full spin-up again so Im back on track with the company and how to use your services. When he recruited me, Bill got me up to speed pretty well, but thats been a long time ago. Let me know if you, Paul, and/or someone else is the one to go over everything (pretty much from scratch, as if I were a brand new TT member), and we can set up the call. Thanks again,Jim From: Jean James [mailto:jean.james@seniorexecutiveservices.com <mailto:jean.james@seniorexecutiveservices.com>] Sent: Wednesday, August 01, 2012 2:03 PM To: Jim Kuiken Cc: Paul Shahady Subject: RE: Conference call Hi Jim, Paul Shahady (ccd - one of the other Talent Team members) is now established as the Director of Operations and Marketing for Senior Executive Services. Id be happy to chat but Paul may be the best and quickest way to proceed if you have some type of consulting opportunity to discuss. Here is Pauls contact information: Paul Shahady Director of OperationsSenior Executive Services LLC 9290 Ridings BoulevardCenterville, OH 45458-9740 Cell: 937.901.2953Thanks! Jean James From: Jim Kuiken [mailto:hit-reply@linkedin.com <mailto:hit-reply@linkedin.com>] Sent: Wednesday, August 01, 2012 1:05 PM To: Jean James Subject: Conference call Jean,
Can we set up a call? I'm one of your SES Talent Team members. My email is jakuiken@verdantstrategies.com <mailto:jakuiken@verdantstrategies.com>. I look forward to hearing from you so we can set up a call as soon as possible.
Thank you, Jim Kuiken Reply <http://www.linkedin.com/e/-uv8ye1-h5co1tpl-2y/pra/87185231/I190175057_50/EML_inml_rec_reply/?hs=false&tok=3Y9gEzNtKwMlk1> Not interested <http://www.linkedin.com/e/-uv8ye1-h5co1tpl-2y/rnf/87185231/I190175057_50/EML_inml_rec_decline/?hs=false&tok=2ioCNf3VqwMlk1> View Jim's LinkedIn profile <http://www.linkedin.com/e/-uv8ye1-h5co1tpl-2y/fpg/33866093/EML_inml_rec_prof/?hs=false&tok=2-XIymZm2wMlk1> Don't want to receive e-mail notifications?
